documents.document:
DJ Deval on Galaxy FM (UK) 9th Nov 2006

DJ Deval on Galaxy FM (UK) 9th Nov 2006

Well hello music lovers!

I will be doing a small guest spot on Riley and Durrant's "Nu Breed" show on Galaxy FM tonight (Thursday 9thNov 2006) between 11pm-1am GMT.

Be sure to tune in to hear the best in cutting edge and up-and-coming dance music.

Tune in on Thur 9th Nov 11pm-1am GMT:
Galaxy Manchester - 102 fm
Galaxy Birmingham - 102.2 fm
Galaxy North East (Leeds, Yorkshire, Humberside) - 105 fm
Sky Digital channel 921
NTL channel 887

or on DAB Digital Radio

The show will be available to "listen again" for a week after through www.galaxyfm.co.uk

Peas and Gravey!!!

Switch MC + Goldie - Manchester Fri 10th Nov

Well,

Probably the biggest Drum and Bass event in Manchester's history is nearly upon us!

Tomorrow night Metropolis takes over the Warehouse Project (Formerly the Boddingtons Brewery), Manchester, for 8 hours of pure musical hedonism!

Catch myself (Switch MC) with Golide from 1am-2am in the main room.

For further line ups check out http://www.thewarehouseproject.com/line-ups/

Hit me up...
msn:mike_deval@hotmail.com
aim: dj deval uk

See you there!

Switch MC - Bookings now being taken for 2007!

Switch MC: one of Manchester's longest established MCs.

A true crowd controller and compare, Switch is resident at Turbulence (Newcastle) and regularly performs across Europe and is now supporting Goldie (with Goldie's resident MC, Low Qui) and has a new residency at Therapy Sessions, Manchester.

Having established his reputation through residencies at many of the seminal events across the Northwest (Sophonic Sessions, Metropolis, Spellbound, Gutterfunk, Rollin' Soundz) Switch has mastered the art of controling the crowd and complementing the beats.

Having gained the respect of his fellow peers, Switch is currently working on music productions with the likes of Roughshod, Riley and Durrant (Ministry Of Sound / Galaxy FM), Mak and Octane and DJ Deval.

"Let the sounds take over your mind, your body and your soul"

For bookings or further information (press pack, samples etc) please contact:
info@industryartists.co.uk
www.myspace.com/switchmcuk

DJ Deval aka Switch MC Live From Galaxy FM 9th Nov 2006

Easy.....

Below is a little link to a recent interview I did on Galaxy FM on Riley and Durrant's "Nu Breed Show".

Feel free to visitngthe link and download the interview - but don't forget to let me know what you think by leaving some feedback on the blog!

http://www.industryartists.co.uk/DJDevalGalaxyFM091106128kbs.mp3

Live on ITV2 Wed 22nd Nov 2006 0100am

Well - thats all you need to know!

Tune in for one hell of a laugh!

London and ITV2.... here we come!!!

Germany!

Well, got to give a big thanks and shout to all the people over in Germany for the party last weekend!

It was a pleasure to be there and it was a wicked party!

Hope to see you all again in the not too distant future!

DJ Deval / Switch MC - World of Drum and Bass Tour Booking

The World of Drum & Bass Tour is about to touch down in 2007!
Artists on the event include:

DJ SS - TC - Distorted Minds - Influx UK - LTC - DJ Deval - MC Jakes MC Biggie - Switch MC

For more info on booking this tour or the artists involved contact:
www.wodnb.com
www.myspace.com/wodnb
www.umcmanagement.co.uk
www.contagiousmusiq.com

What A Weekend! 24-25 Nov 2006

Well, what a hectic weekend!
Got to give a big shout out to Phobia, Steve, Jubie, Doug, Angel, Nosia, Skitty, Pendulum, Verse and everyone else that attended "Turbulence" at Digital (Newcastle) on Friday night.... BIG! - Check the slide show up on my page now!

Secondly, a big shout to Kinda, John C, Iceman, Vicky, Bugg and Raiden + all the crew that came down to "Therapy Sessions" at Scubar (Manchester) - Raiden droppingsome wicked beats!

Roll on the Warehouse Project on December 2nd!

DJ Deval on Frequency 88.1FM (Leeds) - Sat 2nd Dec

Hellooooo

I will be doing a guest mix on Frequency 88.1 FM (Leeds) on Saturday 2nd December 2006 at 11.00pm

Tune in to hear a lot of new beats, some golden oldies and more!

You can phone/text into the show for requests or shouts on 07999 605 881 and you can also listen live on www.leedsdrumandbass.co.uk

Turn on, tune in and cop out!

Switch MC @ Warehouse Project - Sat 2nd Dec

It is upon us once again.... The legendary Warehouse Project at the infamous Boddington's Brewery, Manchester!

Saturday 2nd December...... Check the fucking line up:

THE BEAT MONKEYS
KRAFTY KUTS
THE JUNGLE DRUMMER
DJ YODA
MAD PROFESSOR
DJ MARKY + MC
LEMON D AND DILLINJA
PROPHECY, MARK OD AND SWITCH MC
THE APE SOUNDSYSTEM
RICH REASON
DAWN RAID

Have it!!!!!!

Snatch @ Keele Uni 9th Dec 2006

Howdy!

I have been called in at the last minute to play at Snatch (Keele Uni) tonight. I have heard about this event for a long time and that it is a great party. So anyhow, check the info below and try and get down.

Event: SNATCH presents GROOVERIDER @ Keele University (Stoke on Trent)
Date: Sat 09/12/2006 - 9pm - 3am

DJs:
GROOVERIDER (90 mins)
PROPHECY
REDEYE
MOZ
CAT

MCs: MC SUNNY DHAN & GUESTS

DJ Deval Presents... The DnB Mixtape Vol 1

- DJ Deval Presents... The DnB Mixtape Vol 1 (12th Round Recordings)
Well, it has taken a while to put together but the DnB mixtape Vol 1 is 'nearly' ready to drop. After the final session, I am waiting for the master and then it is straight to the copying house. It's not necessarily a Mixtape as it will be on CD and you will also be able to download it, but you know what I mean. Heres some blurb from the back cover:
"The DnB Mixtape Vol 1 represents more than just another DJ mix - It presents to you the past, the present and the future of Drum & Bass music. Mixed by DJ Deval, this selection features over 30 timeless tracks... a true reflection of dancefloors across the globe! Shouts to everyone that has every helped or hindered the progress of the artists featured on this, the DnB Mixtape Vol 1."

Please feel free to visit www.djdeval.co.uk for more free mixes and mp3 downloads and also, hit me up on www.myspace.com/djdeval and add my to your friends list - I've just updated the space so go and have a look at some of the gallaries.

w: www.djdeval.co.uk
ms: www.myspace.com/djdeval
e: djdeval@djdeval.co.uk

DJ Deval - Live Mix - Turbulence 25/08/06

- DJ Deval - Live mix from Turbulence (Newcastle) Fri 25th Aug 2006
Follow this link and ye shall receive nothing less than a brand new, live mix from myself recorded at one of the best DnB nights in the land, Turbulence. A big shout out to Phobia, Steve, Dave, Super Velience and all the crew up there!
Link: http://www.industryartists.co.uk/DJ_Deval-Live-Turbulence250806.mp3
Tracklisting:
1 Makoto - Noose
2 Silva D - Love and Hate (Remix)
3 DJ Aki and Sonic - Unknown
4 UFO - The Planet Plan - DJ Die Remix
5 Influx Datum - Back for More
6 Unknown
7 Influx UK - Number 1 Bass Rocker
8 D Bridge and AI - Odyssea
9 Cyantific - Flashback - The Authors Remix
10 Alix Perez - Just Memories
11 Adam F - Circles
12 Marcus Intalex - Out of Tune
13 Unknown
14 The Authors - Fantasy
15 Roberto - Maturity
16 The Authors - 16th Century
17 Mace - Forever Soul - The Authors Remix

DJ Deval - Live on BBC 1Xtra 24/10/06 7-10pm GMT

- DJ Deval - Live on L Double's "Connexions" BBC 1Xtra Show - Tues 24th Oct 7pm-10pm GMT
Yep, linking up with an old friend of mine (L Double) and being joined by a rowdey crew of Mancunian vocalists (Broke N English, Jenna G, Tonn Piper, Skeez, SAS and Switch MC). Sounds like its going to be "Off Da Hook" - You're damn right!

DJ Deval - BBC 1Xtra Free MP3 Download

- DJ Deval - "Suspicious" - Free mp3 download from BBC 1Xtra
As it says on the tin, visit http://www.bbc.co.uk/1xtra/drumbass/dandbdownloads.shtml and feel free to download one of my new tracks, "Suspicious". Let me know what you think by leaving a message on the 1Xtra feedback pages.
